sentences.sContent: The town itself is believed to be largely deserted after many of its inhabitants fled the impending crackdown, some of them crossing the border to nearby Turkey.
sentences.sContent_eng: The town itself is believed to be largely deserted after many of its inhabitants fled the impending crackdown, some of them crossing the border to nearby Turkey.
sentences.sCn: 据信，许多居民逃离即将发生的镇压活动之后，这个城镇大部分已经被遗弃，其中一些人穿越边境逃往附近的土耳其。

synos.tran: 即将发生的；迫切的；悬挂的

remMethod.val: im(进入) + pend(挂) + ing → 挂到眼前 → 即将发生的， 逼近的
